CS-GO is a team shooter game, it requires some intelligence to play and you need to manage your money to be able to afford weapons, armor and defusers. There are 2 teams one team is the terroriste and the other team is the counter terrorists. The terrorists plant a bomb and defend it until it explodes and the counter terrorists try to defuse the bomb. The game doesn't take that much space about 15GB.
